snippet: Marin Cilic cannot get enough of pursuing his new number one hobby -- polishing the life-size replica U.S. Open trophy that now sits proudly on a mantelpiece in his Zagreb home....

headline.print_headline: Cilic Cannot Get Enough of Seeing His New Friend
headline.main: Cilic Cannot Get Enough of Seeing His New Friend

lead_paragraph: Marin Cilic cannot get enough of pursuing his new number one hobby -- polishing the life-size replica U.S. Open trophy that now sits proudly on a mantelpiece in his Zagreb home.
